column4: Hey its might not be a suitable channel for this kind of question but i will ask it anyway . . .  I'm looking for Centralized Access software or also know as PUM (Privileged User Manager) i have found some but not free solutions. If anybody using such kinda software pleas let me know which one thanks
usr13_  nope i want something that has web interface and policies
sudo has policies, you can configure it easily to fit almost any need...
